verses.verse: וַיָּב֤וֹא <WH935> Then came אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> unto me and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these הֶעֱל֤וּ <WH5927> have set up גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶם֙ <WH1544> their idols עַל־ <WH5921> in לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> in their heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> of their iniquity נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> and put נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> their face הַאִדָּרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> should I be enquired אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> of at all לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore דַּבֵּר־ <WH1696> Therefore speak א֠וֹתָם <WH853> וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> unto them and say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Every man אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who יַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> that setteth up אֶת־ <WH853> גִּלּוּלָ֜יו <WH1544> his idols אֶל־ <WH413> in לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֤וֹל <WH4383> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנוֹ֙ <WH5771> of his iniquity יָשִׂים֙ <WH7760> and putteth נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> before פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face וּבָ֖א <WH935> and cometh אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> to the prophet אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> I the LORD נַעֲנֵ֧יתִי <WH6030> will answer ל֦וֹ [בָהּ כ] (בָ֖א ק) בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> according to the multitude גִּלּוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1544> of his idols

לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order תְּפֹ֥שׂ <WH8610> That I may take אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> in their own heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who נָזֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH2114> because they are all estranged מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and בְּגִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> from me through their idols כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Therefore say אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Repent וְהָשִׁ֔יבוּ <WH7725> and turn מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from גִּלּֽוּלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1544> [yourselves] from your idols וּמֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8441> from all your abominations הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> and turn away פְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> your faces

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> For every one אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> anyone מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמֵהַגֵּר֮ <WH1616> or of the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> in Israel וְיִנָּזֵ֣ר <WH5144> which separateth מֵֽאַחֲרַ֗י <WH310> himself from me וְיַ֤עַל <WH5927> and setteth up גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <WH1544> his idols אֶל־ <WH413> in לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנ֔וֹ <WH5771> of his iniquity יָשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> and putteth נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> before פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> his face וּבָ֤א <WH935> and cometh אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> to a prophet לִדְרָשׁ־ <WH1875> to enquire ל֣וֹ בִ֔י אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of him concerning me I the LORD נַֽעֲנֶה־ <WH6030> will answer לּ֖וֹ בִּֽי׃

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> And I will set פָנַ֜י <WH6440> my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> against that man הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he וַהֲשִֽׂמֹתִ֙יהוּ֙ <WH8074> and will make לְא֣וֹת <WH226> him a sign וְלִמְשָׁלִ֔ים <WH4912> and a proverb וְהִכְרַתִּ֖יו <WH3772> and I will cut him off מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from the midst עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס

וְהַנָּבִ֤יא <WH5030> And if the prophet כִֽי־ <WH3588> if יְפֻתֶּה֙ <WH6601> be deceived וְדִבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> when he hath spoken דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> a thing אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I the LORD פִּתֵּ֔יתִי <WH6601> have deceived אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַנָּבִ֣יא <WH5030> that prophet הַה֑וּא <WH1931> and I וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> and I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִי֙ <WH3027> my hand עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against וְהִ֨שְׁמַדְתִּ֔יו <WH8045> upon him and will destroy מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> him from the midst עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> And they shall bear עֲוֹנָ֑ם <WH5771> the punishment of their iniquity כַּֽעֲוֹן֙ <WH5771> the punishment הַדֹּרֵ֔שׁ <WH1875> of him that seeketh כַּעֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> shall be even as the punishment הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> of the prophet יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

לְ֠מַעַן <WH4616> order לֹֽא־ <WH3808> may no יִתְע֨וּ <WH8582> may go no more astray ע֤וֹד <WH5750> longer בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> That the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאַֽחֲרַ֔י <WH310> from me וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יִטַּמְּא֥וּ <WH2930> neither be polluted ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6588> any more with all their transgressions וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> become לִ֣י לְעָ֗ם <WH5971> but that they may be my people וַֽאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and I may be their God נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again to me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> when the land כִּ֤י <WH3588> if תֶחֱטָא־ <WH2398> sinneth לִי֙ לִמְעָל־ <WH4603> against me by trespassing מַ֔עַל <WH4604> grievously וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> then will I stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> against וְשָׁבַ֥רְתִּי <WH7665> upon it and will break לָ֖הּ מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> the staff לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> of the bread וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּי־ <WH7971> thereof and will send בָ֣הּ רָעָ֔ב <WH7458> famine וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> upon it and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> both אָדָ֥ם <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

וְ֠הָיוּ <WH1961> become שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> Though these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> even these בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> were in it נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> Noah [דָּנִאֵל כ] (דָּנִיאֵ֣ל <WH1840> Daniel ק) וְאִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> and Job הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> by בְצִדְקָתָם֙ <WH6666> by their righteousness יְנַצְּל֣וּ <WH5337> they should deliver נַפְשָׁ֔ם <WH5315> [but] their own souls נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

לֽוּ־ <WH3863> If חַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> beasts רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> I cause noisome אַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> to pass through בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land וְשִׁכְּלָ֑תָּה <WH7921> and they spoil וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> became שְׁמָמָה֙ <WH8077> it so that it be desolate מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> no עוֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> that no man may pass through מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because הַחַיָּֽה׃ <WH2416> of the beasts

שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> [Though] these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men הָאֵלֶּה֮ <WH428> these בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <WH8432> [were] in it חַי־ <WH2416> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> either בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> neither sons וְאִם־ <WH518> or בָּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> nor daughters יַצִּ֑ילוּ <WH5337> they shall deliver הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> They לְבַדָּם֙ <WH905> alone יִנָּצֵ֔לוּ <WH5337> they only shall be delivered וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> but the land תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <WH8077> shall be desolate

א֛וֹ <WH176> Or חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> a sword אָבִ֖יא <WH935> Or [if] I bring עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon that land הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְאָמַרְתִּ֗י <WH559> and say חֶ֚רֶב <WH2719> Sword תַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> go through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> so that I cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at אָדָ֥ם <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

וּשְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> Though these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men הָאֵלֶּה֮ <WH428> even these בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <WH8432> [were] in it חַי־ <WH2416> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַצִּ֖ילוּ <WH5337> they shall deliver בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> neither sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> nor daughters כִּ֛י <WH3588> for הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they לְבַדָּ֖ם <WH905> alone יִנָּצֵֽלוּ׃ <WH5337> but they only shall be delivered

א֛וֹ <WH176> Or דֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> a pestilence אֲשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> Or [if] I send אֶל־ <WH413> against הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> into that land הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֨י <WH8210> and pour out חֲמָתִ֤י <WH2534> my fury עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> in בְּדָ֔ם <WH1818> upon it in blood לְהַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> to cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at אָדָ֥ם <WH120> from it man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

וְנֹ֨חַ <WH5146> Though Noah [דָּנִאֵל כ] (דָּנִיאֵ֣ל <WH1840> Daniel ק) וְאִיּוֹב֮ <WH347> and Job בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <WH8432> [were] in it חַי־ <WH2416> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> nor בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> neither son אִם־ <WH518> or בַּ֖ת <WH1323> daughter יַצִּ֑ילוּ <WH5337> they shall deliver הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> by בְצִדְקָתָ֖ם <WH6666> by their righteousness יַצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> they shall [but] deliver נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> their own souls פ

כִּי֩ <WH3588> when כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אַ֣ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when אַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> my four שְׁפָטַ֣י ׀ <WH8201> judgments הָרָעִ֡ים <WH7451> sore חֶ֠רֶב <WH2719> the sword וְרָעָ֞ב <WH7458> and the famine וְחַיָּ֤ה <WH2416> beast רָעָה֙ <WH7451> and the noisome וָדֶ֔בֶר <WH1698> and the pestilence שִׁלַּ֖חְתִּי <WH7971> How much more when I send אֶל־ <WH413> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> upon Jerusalem לְהַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> to cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at אָדָ֥ם <WH120> from it man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold נֽוֹתְרָה־ <WH3498> Yet behold therein shall be left בָּ֜הּ פְּלֵטָ֗ה <WH6413> a remnant הַֽמּוּצָאִים֮ <WH3318> that shall be brought forth בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> [both] sons וּבָנוֹת֒ <WH1323> and daughters הִנָּם֙ <WH2005> are going יוֹצְאִ֣ים <WH3318> behold they shall come forth אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <WH7200> unto you and ye shall see אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> their way וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <WH5949> and their doings וְנִחַמְתֶּ֗ם <WH5162> and ye shall be comforted עַל־ <WH5921> against הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> concerning the evil אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> that I have brought עַל־ <WH5921> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> upon Jerusalem אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֵבֵ֖אתִי <WH935> [even] concerning all that I have brought עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וְנִחֲמ֣וּ <WH5162> And they shall comfort אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when תִרְא֥וּ <WH7200> you when ye see אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> their ways וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <WH5949> and their doings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּי֩ <WH3588> when לֹ֨א <WH3808> not חִנָּ֤ם <WH2600> without cause עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <WH6213> that I have not done אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> all that I have done בָ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> in it saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
